title: Group Therapy - How do I Handle Childhood Trauma?
description: Someone emailed us their Group Therapy today and is asking if it's ok to forgive their parents for being not so great parents. If she shouldn't forgive them, how should she handle her childhood trauma that affects her still today as adult.
itunes:summary: Someone emailed us their Group Therapy today and is asking if it's ok to forgive their parents for being not so great parents. If she shouldn't forgive them, how should she handle her childhood trauma that affects her still today as adult.
